header_titles.about: We are here to make your life better
header_titles.download: Discover and book services with Easy Panda
header_titles.geography: Easy Panda is the first home service platform that works in all Baltic countries
header_titles.providers: Do more, think less. Haven't registered yet?
header_titles.random: Easy Panda makes bookings fast, transparent and easy.

header_paragraphs.about: Nowadays everything we want to know is just a few clicks away. However, when it comes to finding quality services near our home we usually feel stuck and helpless spending hours on the internet and asking around for advice. Not to mention that it might not be possible to get the services in a convenient and time-saving way. To solve this we created Easy Panda, an easy and reliable way to take care of your home.
header_paragraphs.download: You are not only saving the time that would have been wasted on browsing through the web, you also discover already verified service providers with transparent pricing and availability, all with just a few clicks.
header_paragraphs.geography1: Our goal is to deliver our services to every household within the reach of fingertips, so that you can relax and spend your time on things that really matter in life.
header_paragraphs.geography2: Turn on location services and see if we are available in your city. Open Easy Panda and see what services you can get near you. If you want to see us in your city, please let us know about that or follow us on social media to know the latest public announcements and news.
header_paragraphs.order: Finding the right service provider is completely free on Easy Panda. If you have some work to be done, then just choose a service category that fits your need.
header_paragraphs.providers: Your business needs more. To help you to get more customers and keep everything in order we offer a mobile solution and web admin to manage all your bookings, payments, invoices and employees.
header_paragraphs.random: Once you have started your booking the price is show or calculated. Pick a data and time, and choose only from available service providers. Once you have found the one that caught your eye, make an instant booking and get a service.
